Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Belden
ShortDescription: Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand & Austin, due to construction near Austin/Belden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Fullerton, Narragansett, Grand, then resume over their normal route on Austin.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to construction near Austin/Belden.

Headline: #44 Wallace Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wallace/39th
ShortDescription: Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temp. rerouted via Halsted, Pershing, Wallace, then resume over their normal route, due to construction nr Wallace/39th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Pershing, Wallace, then resume over their normal route.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to construction near Wallace/39th.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Forest Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Forest Park. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
